job.title: Looking for Full Stack Developer who can work remotely
job.description:
About the job
Job Description:

Design and maintain of the overall architecture of the web applications and platforms with a proficient knowledge of back-end programming languages such as PHP, Python, Ruby, Java, JavaScipt, etc.
Implementation of a robust set of services and APIs to power the web application using various techniques including RESTful and SOAP, web services. Etc.
Build reusable code and libraries for future use, including HTML5/CSS3 code bases, advanced JS libraries and frameworks such as AngularJS, KnockoutJS, etc. as well as a proficient knowledge of client side scripting and JavaScript frameworks including jQuery.
Optimization of the application for maximum speed and scalability using Content Management Systems such as Adobe Experience Manager, Drupal, WordPress, etc.
An understanding of fundamental web design principles to build a scalable web application.
Implementation of security and data protection, data migration, transformation, and scripting.
Translation of UI/UX wireframes to visual elements using HTML5/CSS3 and image authoring tools such as Photoshop.
Integration of the front-end and back-end aspects of the web application and content delivery systems.
Integration of marketing stack platforms (web, email, sms) to deliver seamless experiences across digital channels.
Other duties as assigned.


Requirements:

3-8+ years of .NET/Angular experience required.
Azure/DevOps/ServiceNow is a huge plus but willing to train if needed.
2-3 years of .NET/Angular experience required.
Azure/DevOps/ServiceNow is a huge plus but willing to train if needed.
Root-Cause Analysis
Documentation
Maintenance
IT Support


Education and/or Experience Required

Bachelor's Degree in Computer and Information Science, Computer Engineering or Information Technology (Substitutions- Six (6) years related and progressive experience in lieu of Bachelor's degree.)
3-5 years Internet/Web Development

customFields.generatedInputsAIv2: {"title":"Looking for Freelance Web Developer who can work remotely","skills":[{"skillUid":"996364628025274385"},{"skillUid":"1052162208999198724"},{"skillUid":"1031626795211276288"},{"skillUid":"996364628025274383"},{"skillUid":"1031626745110315008"}],"scope":{"duration":"474250516458926080","segmentation":"535795054385852416","expertise":1},"budget":{}}
customFields.generatedDescriptionAIv2:
We are currently looking for a highly skilled and experienced Freelance Web Developer to join our team. This position allows for remote work, providing flexibility and convenience. We are seeking an individual with a strong background in web development, who is capable of working independently on various web development projects.

As a Freelance Web Developer, your primary responsibilities will involve designing, developing, and maintaining various websites. It will be crucial to ensure that these websites are user-friendly and meet our client's specific requirements. Therefore, excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail are key attributes we are looking for in the successful candidate.

Given the fast-paced nature of our environment, the ability to work effectively under pressure is essential. In order to excel in this role, you should possess a deep understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, WordPress, React, Angular, Node.js, Docker, AWS, Google Cloud, Kubernetes, and Terraform.

If you are a self-motivated individual with a passion for web development and the desire to work remotely, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Join our team and contribute your expertise to our projects, while enjoying the flexibility of remote work.
